001package imagingbook.pub.geometry.line;
002
003import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
004
005import java.util.Locale;
006
007import imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic;
008import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
009import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
010
011/**
012 * This class represents a line in parametric form: 
013 * x = s + t v, where s is a start point on the line,
014 * v is a direction vector, and t is a real variable.
015 * Instances are immutable.
016 *
017 */
018public class ParametricLine {
019        
020        private final double[] s, v;
021        
022        public ParametricLine(double[] s, double[] v) {
023                if (s.length != 2 || v.length != 2) {
024                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("vectors s, v must be of length 2");
025                }
026                if (Arithmetic.isZero(Matrix.normL2squared(v))) {
027                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("direction vector (v) must be nonzero");
028                }
029                this.s = s.clone();
030                this.v = v.clone();
031        }
032        
033        public double[] getS() {
034                return s;
035        }
036
037        public double[] getV() {
038                return v;
039        }
040        
041        // --------------------------
042        
043        public static ParametricLine from(AlgebraicLine al) {
044                double[] p = al.getParameters();
045                // not needed, since algebraic lines are always normalized (i.e. A^2 + B^2 = 1)
046                double norm2 = sqr(p[0]) + sqr(p[1]);           // = A^2 + B^2
047                double scale = -p[2] / norm2;                           // = -C / ||(A,B)||^2
048                double[] s = {scale * p[0], scale * p[1]};      // = (-CA, -CB)
049                double[] v = {-p[1], p[0]};                                     // = (-B, A)
050                return new ParametricLine(s, v);
051        }
052        
053        @Override
054        public String toString() {
055                return String.format(Locale.US, "%s <s=[%.3f, %.3f], v=[%.3f, %.3f]>",
056                                this.getClass().getSimpleName(), s[0], s[1], v[0], v[1]);
057        }
058        
059        // --------------------------
060        
061        public static void main (String[] args) {
062                Pnt2d p1 = Pnt2d.from(1, 2);
063                Pnt2d p2 = Pnt2d.from(4, 3);
064                AlgebraicLine al1 = AlgebraicLine.from(p1, p2);
065                System.out.println("al1 = " + al1);
066                ParametricLine pl = ParametricLine.from(al1);
067                System.out.println("pl = " + pl);
068                AlgebraicLine al2 = AlgebraicLine.from(pl);
069                System.out.println("al2 = " + al2);
070                System.out.println("al1 = al2 ? " + al1.equals(al2));
071        }
072
073        /*
074        al1 = AlgebraicLine <a=-0.316, b=0.949, c=-1.581>
075        pl = ParametricLine <s=[-0.500, 1.500], v=[-0.949, -0.316]>
076        al2 = AlgebraicLine <a=0.316, b=-0.949, c=1.581>
077        al1 = al2 ? true
078        */
079
080}
